collectionMetadata.name: Number of Radiation Licenses Issued by Type, Annual
collectionMetadata.description:
Breakdown of ionising and non-ionising radiation licenses issued aggregated annually

__Licence Description__

* Ionising Radiation L1 Licence: Manufacture, possess for sale or deal in ionising radiation irradiating apparatus

* Ionising Radiation L2 Licence: Manufacture, possess for sale or deal in radioactive materials

* Ionising Radiation L3 Licence: Keep or possess ionising radiation irradiating apparatus for use (other than sale)

* Ionising Radiation L4 Licence: Keep or possess radioactive materials for use (other than sale)

* Ionising Radiation L5 Licence: Use an ionising radiation irradiating apparatus

* Ionising Radiation L6 Licence: Use radioactive material

* Ionising Radiation L6A Licence: Transport radioactive materials

* Ionising Radiation L7A Licence: Import a consignment of ionising radiation irradiating apparatus

* Ionising Radiation L7B Licence: Export a consignment of ionising radiation irradiating apparatus

* Ionising Radiation L8A Licence: Import a consignment of radioactive materials / Transit a consigment of nuclear materials

* Ionising Radiation L8B Licence: Export a consignment of radioactive materials

* Ionising Radiation R1 Licence: Register as a radiation worker to perform radiation work under the supervision of a licensee

* Non Ionising Radiation N1 Licence: Manufacture, possess for sale or deal in non-ionising radiation apparatus

* Non Ionising Radiation N2 Licence: Keep or possess non-ionising radiation irradiating apparatus for use (other than sale)

* Non Ionising Radiation N3 Licence: Use an non-ionising radiation irradiating apparatus

* Non Ionising Radiation N4A Licence: Import a consignment of non-ionising radiation irradiating apparatus

* Non Ionising Radiation N4B Licence: Export a consignment of non-ionising radiation irradiating apparatus

datasetMetadata.name: Number of Radiation Licenses Issued by Type, Annual
